properties.description: If you have little ones and want a supportive, fun and creative environment to warm up at, then the Penhill Playgroup Stay & Play Group is the place for you! Open to all parents, carers and guardians, this space is filled with activities to keep your little ones entertained, whilst you take a break and chat to others. This warm space will operate on Tuesday's from 12:30pm to 2:30pm (term time only). Hot & cold drinks will be served and in addition soup and toast has also been added to the menu. There is a small charge to attend the session. If you are struggling with money, then please speak to a member of the team, who will be able to support you. Find out more about the sessions here: https://www.penhillplaygroup.org.uk/

hours._text: If you have little ones and want a supportive, fun and creative environment to warm up at, then the Penhill Playgroup Stay & Play Group is the place for you! This warm space will operate on Tuesday's from 12:30pm to 2:30pm (term time only). Hot & cold drinks will be served and in addition soup and toast has also been added to the menu. There is a small charge to attend the session. If you are struggling with money, then please speak to a member of the team, who will be able to support you. Find out more about the sessions here: https://www.penhillplaygroup.org.uk/

properties.description: Come and join the folk at Shoreham Free Church on Mondays, Wednesdays, Thursdays & Fridays, between 9am and 1pm. Their warm space will be filled with friendly faces and offer free refreshments, a chance to get creative with jigsaws and there will be access to WiFi available. Whether you want a quiet space or some company, these guys have got it covered. To find out more about what they do, check out their website here: https://www.shorehamfreechurch.co.uk/

properties.description: The cafe at Southwick Community Centre will play host to the warm space. Operating on a Tuesday from 2pm to 4pm, you are welcome to come along, to grab a free hot drink, biscuits or a hot soup and maybe take part in an activity or two. You'll be greeted by volunteers who will be organising a range of activities and quizzes that you can get involved in ... or just to be on hand to sit and chat. Find out more on their website: https://www.southwickcommunitycentre.org.uk/

properties.description: Come along for cake and a chat at St James the Less with Coombes Church, Lancing every 2nd Thursday of the month (12th Jan, 9th Feb, 9th Mar & 13th April) from 10am-12.30pm. Everyone likes cake right? If you are more into play games with a great group of people, then they are also open every 4th Thursday (26th Jan, 23rd Feb, 23rd Mar & 27th April) from 10am-4pm, they'll even throw in a cuppa or two. For more info give them a follow on Facebook: https://en-gb.facebook.com/stjamesthelesslancing/

properties.description: The Circular Space will be opening it's doors on a Monday to Wednesday morning from 9am to 12noon, as part of their warm space offer. If you want to learn a new still, or just have an opportunity to be creative, then this is the warm space for you! Surrounded by a warm welcoming and cosy environment, you will have your pick of reclaimed resources to get your craft on! Have a look at what else they get up to here: www.weareoverthemoon.org
